sentences.sContent: I personally haven't tasted any entomological specimens lately, but I am still rejoicing in the limitless curiosity, the draws me to books and people and places.I hope I never lose it.
sentences.sContent_eng: I personally haven't tasted any entomological specimens lately, but I am still rejoicing in the limitless curiosity, the draws me to books and people and places.I hope I never lose it.
sentences.sCn: 我个人最近并未品尝任何昆虫的标本，但我仍欣喜于自己无限的好奇心，它促使我博览群书、乐于与人交往和四处旅行。 我希望永远拥有好奇心。

remMethod.val: re+joic(=joy高兴) + e → 欣喜， 高兴
